title: UPTOWN STUDIO ~ Top Location! Walk to Downtown, Lightrail & Park
posting_body: ['EXCELLENT UPTOWN LOCATION, North Cap Hill, Central Denver!!', 'Great Views!!', '  3rd floor Studio with full Kitchen and Bath; $1100 includes heat, water, sewer and trash service ($75/mo value)!!', 'Parking via Street only or nearby paylots.. (parking lot next door is currently free on evenings and weekends) - awesome vintage building in unbeatable location!', 'Posted pictures are of actual unit you will be renting!', 'Superb Denver Uptown Location with 2 minute walk to downtown and lightrail stop!', '1960 Sherman Street, Denver, CO 80203', '$1100/mo', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Year Built:', '1910', 'Sq Footage:', '300 sqft.', 'Bedrooms:', 'Studio', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Parking:', 'Street', 'Lease Duration:', '1 Year', 'Deposit:', '$600', 'Pets Policy:', 'Most w/fees $25/mo', 'Laundry:', 'Onsite w/phone app', 'Property Type:', 'Apartment', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Beautiful Vintage Building in excellent Uptown Location.', 'Surrounded by luxury condos and across the street from a park, walk to Downtown Denver and 20th Street Light rail stop in minutes.', 'Hardwood Floors, Appliances.', 'Street parking only, but several pay lots available if needed.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Dining room', 'Walk-in closet', 'Storage space', 'Stove / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Central heat', 'Ceiling fans', 'Cable-ready', 'High-speed internet available', 'Hardwood floor', 'Tile floor', 'High / Vaulted ceiling', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'Vintage building', 'Secured entry', 'Near lightrail  transportation', 'On-street parking', 'LEASE TERMS', '12 month', 'Keywords: Central, Central denver, uptown, cap hill, capitol hill, capital hill, wash park, washington park, congress, congress park, cheesman park, downtown, affordable, great deal, cheap, utilities included, vintage building, turn of the century, lightrail, light rail']
